message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $15,000.  I'm open to discussing this further if you have any thoughts.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I believe I can't justify spending $15,000 on it. Would you consider lowering the price to $10,000?
Hi Bob, I understand your perspective.  While I'm eager to find a fair agreement, $10,000 is below my minimum.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your response. Considering the value of the product, I would like to propose a price of $11,000. This is my best offer based on my budget.
